system.description: You know how to turn wood, leather and twine into lethal bows.
system.basicAction: You can use the MAKIN’ ability to make and repair bows and arrows with normal stats.
system.advAction: You can make high-quality bows. For each success after the first on your MAKIN’ test you can add a weapon quality of your choice. This can be used to add new qualities to an existing bow.
